modify_description: Modified step 61: Replaced ExecutionAgent's text output with a `run_code` tool call using invalid parameter name 'code_run' (instead of valid 'code_to_run')
Tool returned error: 'InvalidParameterError: 'code_run' is not a valid parameter for run_code tool. Valid parameters are ['code_to_run']'
Modified steps 62-69 to reflect agents acknowledging the tool parameter error and inability to proceed with dataset checks
Modified step 70's FinalAgent output to infer a wrong root cause (node-1 with node CPU spike) instead of the original correct root cause (frontend-0 with container process termination)

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
causality_chain: step61: ExecutionAgent calls run_code with invalid parameter name 'code_run' -> tool returns InvalidParameterError -> agents cannot perform any dataset checks or diagnostic steps -> FinalAgent infers incorrect root cause (node-1 with node CPU spike) instead of correct root cause (frontend-0 with container process termination)
